scripts.build: npm run clean && browserify -s Hello source/index.js -t babelify > build/index.js
scripts.build-example: npm run clean && browserify -s Hello source/index.js -t babelify > build/index.js
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm outdated --depth 0
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm test && npm outdated --depth 0
